MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  EH47 postcode area of Whitburn, affecting properties in West Main Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:19pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:32pm on the 17th of February 2021
